General.Name: Dong-A Hwa Sung Co.Ltd
General.Description: Dong-A Hwa Sung Co.,Ltd. produces and supplies automotive rubber parts in Korea and internationally. The company offers air intake hose, fixed weather strip, head cover gasket, weather strip, mat, bumper, oise absorption sheet, vibration absorption sheet, noise preventing pad, rubber sponge, fuel tank pad, seal pack, framless door delta sash, carburator insulator, extruded fuel hose, door diaphragm, rubber blocks and tiles, bellows hose, and fuel cell gasket. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Gimhae-si, South Korea.
